allow:
Bash("$GH" issue create --title "Commit v1.1 changes, verify CI, tag release" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Objective

Commit all v1.1 changes, push to GitHub, verify CI workflows pass, and tag the v1.1 release.

## Requirements

- [ ] Stage and commit all changes
- [ ] Push and verify CI workflows pass \(test.yml, analyze.yml\)
- [ ] Tag v1.1 release

## Context

v1.1 removed legacy Sampler/ModuleBuilder tooling, consolidated on InvokeBuild, added full module template structure, and cleaned up repo layout. Local validation passes: 18/18 tests, 93.1% coverage, 0 analyzer errors.

## Acceptance Criteria

- All CI checks pass on both Ubuntu and Windows
- v1.1 tag exists on the commit
EOF
\)" --milestone "v1.1 Release" --label "ai-task,ai-ready")
